item.title: Jocelyne Wildenstein, Socialite and Tabloid ‘Catwoman,’ Dies at 79
item.description: Her lurid divorce from the wealthy scion of an art-world dynasty earned headlines. Her elaborate plastic surgeries brought even more attention.
